#################################
#  About mapxml/xmplarser
#################################
The code in this directory is for the mapxml binary.
Except for the code in the xmlparser subdir, the source code here was written by Juniper.
The code in the xmlparser directory (xmlParser.cpp and  xmlParser.h) is copyrighted by Frank Vanden Berghen.
See the file xmlparser/Attribution-xmlparser.txt
